name: qgraf

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Qgraf is a computer program that generates Feynman diagrams for various
types of QFT models

dependent_to.name: py-gosam
dependent_to.description:
The package GoSam allows for the automated calculation of one-loop
amplitudes for multi-particle processes in renormalizable quantum field
theories.

dependent_to.name: whizard
dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.
